headline.main: Guardiola Sees Huge Potential in In-Form Sane
headline.print_headline: Guardiola Sees Huge Potential in In-Form Sane

lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has heaped praise on Leroy Sane for his recent run of good form, saying his improvement comes as a result of a learning process that still has a long way to go.
snippet: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has heaped praise on Leroy Sane for his recent run of good form, saying his improvement comes as a result of a learning process that still has a long way to go....
